excerpt: A delicious Vegan BBQ Tofu Skewers recipe perfect for a summer day!

ingredients.name: Extra Firm Tofu
ingredients.quantity: 1 block, pressed and cut into cubes
ingredients.notes: For best results, press tofu for at least 30 minutes before using.

ingredients.name: Wooden Skewers
ingredients.notes: Soaking prevents the skewers from burning

instructions.name: Tofu Marinade
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together tamari, bbq sauce, maple syrup, and liquid smoke.
Add cubed tofu and marinade to a large ziplock bag. Marinate for at least 20 minutes, or overnight in the fridge.

instructions.name: Skewers
instructions: Preheat grill or grill pan to medium-high heat.
Thread marinated tofu, onion, bell pepper, and cherry tomatoes onto skewers.
Grill skewers for 8-10 minutes, flipping occasionally, until vegetables are charred and tofu is heated through.
